English: Strikes the enemy twice in rapid succession.
Filipino: Tamaan ang kalaban ng dalawang beses, nang mabilisan.

English: A spinning finishing move that may stun the enemy.
Draws out the wielded shield's power to increase defense against physical attacks and significantly increase Ranged Block.
Filipino: Dinadagdagan ang depensa ng isang kalasag laban sa melee attacks at tinataasan ang Ranged Block.

English: Increases accuracy and enhances the power of the wielded sword.
Filipino: Dinadagdagan ang Accuracy at lakas ng espada.

English: Increases accuracy and enhances the power of the wielded axe.
Filipino: Dinadagdagan ang Accuracy at lakas ng palakol.
Gumagamit ng element ng isang armas para dagdagan ang iyong attack power.

English: Enhances the power of the wielded sword.
Filipino: Dinadagdagan ang lakas ng isang Espada.

English: Enhances the power of the wielded axe.
Filipino: Dinadagdagan ang lakas ng isang palakol.

English: A single powerful strike that hits all enemies around you.
Filipino: Isang malakas na tama na tinatamaan lahat ng kalaban sa harap.

English: Traps the enemy in a net, immobilizing them.
Absorbs an incoming attack and strikes an enemy with the absorbed damage.
Filipino: Ang skill na ito ay kinukuha ang atake at binabalik pabalik sa kalaban.

English: Reduces all incoming damage from enemies at the cost of attack power.
Filipino: Nababawasan ang lahat ng mga parating na damage ng mga kalaban kapalit ang pagsakripisyo ng attack power. Kailangan ng weapon para magamit.

English: Reflects a portion of the damage received back at the enemy.
Filipino: Ibalik ang ilang bahagi ng damage na natanggap sa kalaban.

English: Increases striking power but makes you more vulnerable to all incoming attacks.
Filipino: Pinapalakas ng striking power. Ngunit mas hihina ka laban sa mga paparating na attacks.

English: Swings the weapon to strike surrounding enemies and push them back. Requires a two-handed weapon.
Filipino: Swings the weapon to strike surrounding enemies and push them back. Requires a two-handed weapon.

Filipino: A powerful downward strike that may reduce HP Restoration on the target. Requires a two-handed weapon.

Filipino: A powerful upward strike that stuns the enemy. Requires a two-handed weapon.

Filipino: A powerful downward strike that lowers the defense of the target. Requires a two-handed weapon.

Filipino: Pounds the ground, hitting surrounding enemies with a chance to stun them. Requires a two-handed weapon.

English: A powerful dual-weapon strike that knocks down the enemy.

Filipino: Pounces on the enemy from afar, stunning them. Requires two weapons.

English: Rapidly strikes surrounding enemies twice with both weapons. Requires two weapons.

Filipino: This monster gains increased Attack while fighting alongside allies.

Filipino: The Demon Lord has cursed you with overwhelming exhaustion, greatly reducing Speed, Attack Speed, and Casting Speed, and lowering all stats.

Filipino: Shade is a powerful god of fear and rage, and they grant this buff to players by imbuing them with a gust of wind that enhances their reflexes and allows them to move faster.

Filipino: Iblis is a revered god of apathy and neutrality, and they grant this buff to players by infusing them with a burst of life energy that increases their maximum health and allows them to withstand more damage.

Filipino: Bubble is a legendary god of joy and purity, and they grant this buff to players by creating a powerful shield that provides an extra layer of defense against enemy attacks.

English: Chance to knock down the target increases.
Filipino: Chance to knock down the target increases.

English: Nen Enhanced strikes will also reduce movement speed.
Filipino: Nen Enhanced strikes will also reduce movement speed.

English: Consumes additional Nen to attempt an extra attack.
Filipino: Consumes additional Nen to attempt an extra attack.

English: Using the skill may not consume Nen.
Filipino: Using the skill may not consume Nen.

English: Casting time is reduced, but skill damage is decreased.
Filipino: Casting time is reduced, but skill damage is decreased.

English: While grabbing an enemy, the damage you take is reduced.
Filipino: While grabbing an enemy, the damage you take is reduced.

English: You can grab all enemies within range with a chance.
Filipino: You can grab all enemies within range with a chance.

English: Movement speed and critical chance increases further when using the skill.
Filipino: Movement speed and critical chance increases further when using the skill.

English: Critical damage increases when using skill.
Filipino: Critical damage increases when using skill.

English: Knuckle damage increases further when using skill.
Filipino: Knuckle damage increases further when using skill.

English: Damage reduction rate increases while meditating.
Filipino: Damage reduction rate increases while meditating.

English: You can move slowly while using the skill.
Filipino: You can move slowly while using the skill.

English: Attack all enemies on the path and give additional bleed damage.
Filipino: Attack all enemies on the path and give additional bleed damage.

English: Attack range increases but rush distance decreases.
Filipino: Attack range increases but rush distance decreases.

English: Increase damage with additional HP cost.
Filipino: Increase damage with additional HP cost.

English: Knock back the enemy hit by the explosion.
Filipino: Knock back the enemy hit by the explosion.

English: Give additional bleeding damage to all enemies hit by the skill.
Filipino: Give additional bleeding damage to all enemies hit by the skill.

English: Whirlwind moves forward, lifting enemies into the air.
Filipino: Whirlwind moves forward, lifting enemies into the air.

English: Successful follow-up hits increased damage is increased further.
Filipino: Successful follow-up hits increased damage is increased further.

English: Increases the chance to knock down enemies.
Filipino: Increases the chance to knock down enemies.

English: Successful follow up hit reduces the target's movement speed.
Filipino: Successful follow up hit reduces the target's movement speed.

English: Casts an aura that greatly reduces the caster's movement speed while increasing allies’ movement speed, critical damage, and attack. Cannot be used with other auras at the same time.
Filipino: Casts an aura that greatly reduces the caster's movement speed while increasing allies’ movement speed, critical damage, and attack. Cannot be used with other auras at the same time.

English: Casts an aura that greatly reduces the caster's movement speed while increasing allies’ movement speed, critical damage, and attack. Cannot be used with other auras at the same time.
Filipino: Casts an aura that greatly reduces the caster's movement speed while increasing allies’ movement speed, critical damage, and attack. Cannot be used with other auras at the same time.

English: Casts an aura that reduces movement speed but increases allies’ defense and block rate.
Filipino: Casts an aura that reduces movement speed but increases allies’ defense and block rate.

English: Casts an aura that reduces the caster's movement speed while increasing allies’ magic attack and critical damage.
Filipino: Casts an aura that reduces the caster's movement speed while increasing allies’ magic attack and critical damage.

English: Casts an aura that greatly reduces movement speed but increases allies’ damage reduction, critical resistance, and element resistance. Cannot be used with other auras at the same time.
Filipino: Casts an aura that greatly reduces movement speed but increases allies’ damage reduction, critical resistance, and element resistance. Cannot be used with other auras at the same time.

English: Casts an aura that greatly reduces movement speed but increases allies’ damage reduction and critical resistance. Cannot be used with other auras at the same time.
Filipino: Casts an aura that greatly reduces movement speed but increases allies’ damage reduction and critical resistance. Cannot be used with other auras at the same time.

English: Consume HP to grant a shield to party members proportional to your HP. If used while a hymn is active, the shield amount is increased by up to 15%.
Filipino: Consume HP to grant a shield to party members proportional to your HP. If used while a hymn is active, the shield amount is increased by up to 15%.

English: Summon a hammer from the skies, leaving a damaging area behind.
Filipino: Summon a hammer from the skies, leaving a damaging area behind.

English: Fire a root in front of you, binding the first enemy hit in place. If the enemy bound is affected by Stone Pillar or Swampy Area, they are Petrified, increasing the magic damage they receive and reducing the physical damage they receive, and stunning them.
Filipino: Fire a root in front of you, binding the first enemy hit in place. If the enemy bound is affected by Stone Pillar or Swampy Area, they are Petrified, increasing the magic damage they receive and reducing the physical damage they receive, and stunning them.

English: Swift piercing attack on a single target in a straight line. Applies a stack of Stigma. If used on a target with 5 Stigma stacks, the attack will piercing all enemies.
Filipino: Swift piercing attack on a single target in a straight line. Applies a stack of Stigma. If used on a target with 5 Stigma stacks, the attack will piercing all enemies.

English: Launch a chain of blades towards your target which binds onto them, spinning and attacking enemies around them, then chaining to another nearby target. Has a chance to apply a stack of Stigma. If used on a target with 5 stacks, will steal HP through hits.
Filipino: Launch a chain of blades towards your target which binds onto them, spinning and attacking enemies around them, then chaining to another nearby target. Has a chance to apply a stack of Stigma. If used on a target with 5 stacks, will steal HP through hits.

English: Slam down on the target with both of your weapons, dealing damage around them. Applies a stack of Stigma. If used on a target with 5 stacks of Stigma, they will be silenced.
Filipino: Slam down on the target with both of your weapons, dealing damage around them. Applies a stack of Stigma. If used on a target with 5 stacks of Stigma, they will be silenced.

English: You are immobilized, physical damage taken is reduced, while magical damage taken is increased.
Filipino: You are immobilized, physical damage taken is reduced, while magical damage taken is increased.

English: Petrifying an enemy using Entangling Roots will grant you with bonuses.
Filipino: Petrifying an enemy using Entangling Roots will grant you with bonuses.

English: Your movement speed is also increased.
Filipino: Your movement speed is also increased.

English: Enemies hit by the aura have a chance to bleed.
Filipino: Enemies hit by the aura have a chance to bleed.

English: Extra damage when used on a burning target is increased.
Filipino: Extra damage when used on a burning target is increased.

English: Ignite your target, dealing damage and burning them. If used on a burning target, the damage is reduced but the target is stunned. Burned enemies also hurt nearby enemies, but do not burn them.
Filipino: Ignite your target, dealing damage and burning them. If used on a burning target, the damage is reduced but the target is stunned. Burned enemies also hurt nearby enemies, but do not burn them.

English: Damage reduction when used on a burning target is reduced.
Filipino: Damage reduction when used on a burning target is reduced.

English: Lock yourself in ice, becoming invulnerable and deal damage to surrounding enemies. You cannot use items or skills while frozen.
Filipino: Lock yourself in ice, becoming invulnerable and deal damage to surrounding enemies. You cannot use items or skills while frozen.

English: Freeze your target in a water bubble, stealing health from them.
Filipino: Freeze your target in a water bubble, stealing health from them.

English: Conjure a gale of wind around yourself, increasing your movement speed and hurting nearby enemies. While in gale, hits have a chance to apply Suffocate stacks. If a target reaches 5 Suffocate stacks, they are stunned, slept, or paralyzed, at random.
Filipino: Conjure a gale of wind around yourself, increasing your movement speed and hurting nearby enemies. While in gale, hits have a chance to apply Suffocate stacks. If a target reaches 5 Suffocate stacks, they are stunned, slept, or paralyzed, at random.

English: You are suffocating. Once you reach 5 stacks, you will be slept, stunned, or paralyzed at random.
Filipino: You are suffocating. Once you reach 5 stacks, you will be slept, stunned, or paralyzed at random.

English: Call upon a ball of lightning towards your target, which will chain to nearby enemies. Has a chance to Shock enemies hit. If the ball hits a shocked target, it will always do maximum damage.
Filipino: Call upon a ball of lightning towards your target, which will chain to nearby enemies. Has a chance to Shock enemies hit. If the ball hits a shocked target, it will always do maximum damage.

English: Become surrounded by storm clouds, periodically striking a nearby enemy with lightning. Lightning strikes always shock targets. Strikes that hit shocked targets always deal maximum damage.
Filipino: Become surrounded by storm clouds, periodically striking a nearby enemy with lightning. Lightning strikes always shock targets. Strikes that hit shocked targets always deal maximum damage.

English: Disrupt the ground, summoning a stone pillar which hurts enemies and lowers their movement speed. After the duration of the pillar, it explodes, dealing extra damage to nearby enemies.
Filipino: Disrupt the ground, summoning a stone pillar which hurts enemies and lowers their movement speed. After the duration of the pillar, it explodes, dealing extra damage to nearby enemies.

English: Create a swamp at the selected area, slowing movement speed and dealing damage. Enemies in the swamp cannot use movement skills.
Filipino: Create a swamp at the selected area, slowing movement speed and dealing damage. Enemies in the swamp cannot use movement skills.

English: Spawn a gust of wind that pushes back nearby enemies, increases magic resistance, and ranged block chance.
Filipino: Spawn a gust of wind that pushes back nearby enemies, increases magic resistance, and ranged block chance.

English: Roots will go through more enemies.
Filipino: Roots will go through more enemies.

English: Roots will explode once they hit an enemy, dealing damage to them. Explosions have a chance to knock enemies down.
Filipino: Roots will explode once they hit an enemy, dealing damage to them. Explosions have a chance to knock enemies down.

English: Fire additional roots in a cone in front of you.
Filipino: Fire additional roots in a cone in front of you.

English: The damage you take from burning enemies is decreased.
Filipino: The damage you take from burning enemies is decreased.

English: The damage you take from enemies affected by water skills is decreased.
Filipino: The damage you take from enemies affected by water skills is decreased.

English: The damage you take from enemies with Suffocate stacks is decreased.
Filipino: The damage you take from enemies with Suffocate stacks is decreased.

English: The damage you take from Shocked enemies is decreased.
Filipino: The damage you take from Shocked enemies is decreased.

English: When enemies are petrified from Entangling Roots, your defense and melee block rate are increased.
Filipino: When enemies are petrified from Entangling Roots, your defense and melee block rate are increased.

English: Skill duration when fully charged is increased.
Filipino: Skill duration when fully charged is increased.

English: Mutation chance when fully charged is 100%.
Filipino: Mutation chance when fully charged is 100%.

English: Damage against enemies with Disable type debuffs is increased.
Filipino: Damage against enemies with Disable type debuffs is increased.

English: Damage against enemies with Weaken type debuffs is increased.
Filipino: Damage against enemies with Weaken type debuffs is increased.

English: Damage taken from enemies with debuffs is decreased.
Filipino: Damage taken from enemies with debuffs is decreased.

English: When fully charged, target will be slept.
Filipino: When fully charged, target will be slept.

English: A blast of hellfire shoots in front of you, dealing tick damage while burning enemies in the line of fire.
Filipino: A blast of hellfire shoots in front of you, dealing tick damage while burning enemies in the line of fire.

English: The skill also heals MP and FP on allies.
Filipino: The skill also heals MP and FP on allies.

English: Grants stun immunity for the duration of the buff.
Filipino: Grants stun immunity for the duration of the buff.

English: Grants resistance to damage over time effects during the duration of the buff.
Filipino: Grants resistance to damage over time effects during the duration of the buff.

English: Consume more of your health to grant more shields to allies.
Filipino: Consume more of your health to grant more shields to allies.

English: The skill's maximum targets is increased.
Filipino: The skill's maximum targets is increased.

English: Maximum number of stacks is increased to 8 at maximum level.
Filipino: Maximum number of stacks is increased to 8 at maximum level.

English: The God of Death gazes upon you.
Filipino: The God of Death gazes upon you.

English: Infuse any elemental skills you use with your weapon's applied element, overriding the skill's element.
Filipino: Infuse any elemental skills you use with your weapon's applied element, overriding the skill's element.

English: Skill scales with INT instead of STA.
Filipino: Skill scales with INT instead of STA.

English: Skill damage scaling is improved, but cooldown is increased.
Filipino: Skill damage scaling is improved, but cooldown is increased.

English: Base damage is increased, but scaling is reduced.
Filipino: Base damage is increased, but scaling is reduced.

English: Health stolen in enhanced effect is increased by 10%.
Filipino: Health stolen in enhanced effect is increased by 10%.

English: Chance to gain an extra Stigma stack.
Filipino: Chance to gain an extra Stigma stack.

English: Remove all your Nen stacks at a cost of power.
Filipino: Remove all your Nen stacks at a cost of power.

English: Curse your target with divine power, recording the highest hit taken and replicating up to 75% of it upon expiry. This debuff can be expired early if pressed again.
Filipino: Curse your target with divine power, recording the highest hit taken and replicating up to 75% of it upon expiry. This debuff can be expired early if pressed again.

English: Up to 100% of the recorded hit is replicated.
Filipino: Up to 100% of the recorded hit is replicated.
